name: Eating Grass Simulator
description:
Exactly what it says in the title. The tale of a little boy who just wants to eat grass without getting caught by his parents. Hold spacebar to eat grass, but don't get spotted.

This game was made for One Mechanic Game Jam 3, using Unity. It doesn't fit with any of the themes, but I thought the idea was funny. It probably isn't.
